IWebCamera

Defines the interface to a WebCamera.

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;

Functions
GetAvailableVideoDevices
static std::vector<CameraInfo> GetAvailableVideoDevices()

Returns a list of cameras available on the system

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;

GetAvailableAudioDevices
static std::vector<AudioInfo> GetAvailableAudioDevices()

Returns a list of audio devices available on the system

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;

CreateWebCamera
CRefObj<IWebCamera> CreateWebCamera(
std::
wstring 
deviceName,
int 
w,
int 
h,
int 
frameRate,
std::
wstring 
audiDeviceName,
int 
samplingRate,
int 
bitsPerSample,
int 
numChannels
)

Creates a new instance of WebCamera.

Parameters
videoDeviceName

symbolic link name for the camera as returned by IWebCamera::GetAvailableVideoDevices

w
int

width in pixels of camera resolution

h
int

height in pixels of camera resolution

frameRate
int

requested frame rate

audioDeviceName

endpoint name for the audio device as returned by IWebCamera::GetAvailableVideoDevices

samplingRate
int

sampling rate for audio

bitsPerSample
int

bits per sample for audio

numChannels
int

number of audio channels

Returns

Returns the newly created camera

Module

import Cameras.WebCamera.IWebCamera;
